title: List of websites that you should visit. They will open in your default web browser.
notice: * these websites are not affiliated or endorsed by the developer. These are only recommendation.

contents.description: Visit the official website of Santa Rosa City Laguna for the latest news and additional information.
Visit the official Santa Rosa FB page for the latest news, updates, and regulation.
Read the lastest information about the current restriction from philippines.travel websites.
EK official websites that should visit for booking and checking if the park is open or not.
Mesmerize with the Nuvali 360 view feature provided by www.nuvali.ph and by the AyalaLand Inc.
Travel the streets virtually with Instant Google Street View.
The themermaidtravels.com has made a blog about the city.
